text:
@TomCottonAR COVID-19 (note: 19 is the year the whole world heard about it) Dementia is running rapid amongst republicans.   
Joe Biden was not my first choice. He was not my seventh choice. He was not my sixteenth choice. But you're Damn right that I'll be voting for him in November.
